MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the ML11 postcode area of Lanark, affecting properties in Carstairs, Ravenstruther and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and engineers have been working throughout the evening to repair grounded overhead lines between the Ravenstruther and Carstruthers areas. Our team has managed to restore power to some properties and are working to restore all remaining supplies as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:54pm on Saturday, 24th October 2020
